title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS Some examples of shrinkflation, currently. Ryan, if you read this, go to The British Museum. Relax and look at cute animals with me. Look at the patterns on this cat. Starry! Let’s learn about salmon. Dang. I want an ADU. The colors of this skirt make me so happy. All of these butterfly murals are amazing. You can rent a grandma in Japan. How do we feel about vegetables in dessert? Nostalgia hit: sodas from the 90s Stephen King’s Top 10 Favorite Books Fun fact: Wheat Thins are Banned in Europe. Time travel to: Atlantic City 1910s I had no idea that Peggy is short for Margaret. What are the top 10 states that eat the most fast food? I’ve never had a snack wrap. It’s back. Are we going to burn out on pistachio? On the wishlist: a visual timer like this Weekend reading: Food for Thought Weekend Treat: Bust out your ice cream maker, and make Green Tea Ice Cream this weekend! The post I LOVE LISTS appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: I Love Lists is a weekly roundup of the best links from around the internet, curated by Tracy Benjamin of Shutterbean. Discover inspiring reads, creative ideas, delicious recipes, and fun finds every week!
text: Matt Armendariz July 11, 2025 Having loved it for YEARS, I will never get tired of pistachio. Especially after having tried that damn Dubai chocolate bar… oh man. It’s better than I thought it would be. Reply
html:
Matt Armendariz July 11, 2025

Having loved it for YEARS, I will never get tired of pistachio. Especially after having tried that damn Dubai chocolate bar… oh man. It’s better than I thought it would be.

Reply
